name: Spinning Blades.io
description:
Collect the blades on your way and enlarge your collection.
use your spin to slay your enemies in this furious sword mayhem!
Crush with other players and beat them with your blades ! If you have much more blades, then you are more likely to win !
Best io game ever ! Spinning the Knife !

Who will survive in this crazy battle Blades of guts and steel?
Have fun :)
